metadata.title: UTK Scottish Kilt Black Powder Coated Belt Buckle
features: These will not work with traditional belts. You must buy a velcro Scottish kilt belt
description: UT Kilts offers the best priced and highest quality kilt belt buckles around. These buckles are designed to fit standard velcro kilt belts. This black powder coated finish comes in different designs which allows you to choose the unique look you are looking for. Don't forget to purchase a Scottish kilt belt from UT Kilts as almost all traditional belts will not work with these buckles.
